channel.title: Gmail on WoW
channel.description: Recent content in Gmail on WoW

item.title: Python_Gmail
item.description: 準備 啓用兩步驗證 創建程式密碼 授權外部訪問 Google Account。 發送電子郵件 發送文本電子郵件 import smtplib from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart from email.mime.text import MIMEText username = "@gmail.com" password = "password" mail_from = "@gmail.com" mail_to = "@gmail.com" mail_subject = "Test Subject" mail_body
